io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.client

Interface HalApiClient


  • @ProviderType
public interface HalApiClient
    A generic HAL API client that will provide a dynamic proxy implementation of a given HAL API interface which loads data via HTTP as required when the interface methods annotated with Related, ResourceState etc are called.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HalApiClient create(JsonResourceLoader jsonLoader, RequestMetricsCollector metrics) 
      static HalApiClient create(JsonResourceLoader jsonLoader, RequestMetricsCollector metrics, HalApiAnnotationSupport annotationSupport, HalApiReturnTypeSupport returnTypeSupport) 
      <T> T getEntryPoint(String uri, Class<T> halApiInterface) 

    • Method Detail

      • getEntryPoint

        <T> T getEntryPoint(String uri,
                    Class<T> halApiInterface)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the HAL API interface type
        Parameters:
        uri - the absolute path (and query parameters) of the entry point
        halApiInterface - the HAL API interface class of a service's entry point resource
        Returns:
        a proxy implementation of the specified entry point interface

      • create

        static HalApiClient create(JsonResourceLoader jsonLoader,
                           RequestMetricsCollector metrics)
        Parameters:
        jsonLoader - implements the actual loading (and caching) of JSON/HAL resources via any HTTP client library
        metrics - an instance of RequestMetricsCollector to collect performance relevant data for the current incoming request
        Returns:
        an instance of HalApiClient that should be re-used for all upstream requests required by the current incoming request

      • create

        static HalApiClient create(JsonResourceLoader jsonLoader,
                           RequestMetricsCollector metrics,
                           HalApiAnnotationSupport annotationSupport,
                           HalApiReturnTypeSupport returnTypeSupport)
        Parameters:
        jsonLoader - implements the actual loading (and caching) of JSON/HAL resources via any HTTP client library
        metrics - an instance of RequestMetricsCollector to collect performance relevant data for the current incoming request
        annotationSupport - an (optional) strategy to identify HAL API interfaces and methods that use different annotations
        returnTypeSupport - an (optional) strategy to support additional return types in your HAL API interface methods
        Returns:
        an instance of HalApiClient that should be re-used for all upstream requests required by the current incoming request
